title: Account Lockout Detected
summary: John Smith's account has been locked out due to multiple unsuccessful login attempts within a minute from IP addresses 192.168.1.102, 192.168.1.103, and 192.168.1.104. This may indicate brute force attack or misconfiguration.
investigation_steps: Investigate IP addresses for potential malicious activity
Check if there are any unusual login attempts from these IPs
Verify if the account lockout is due to misconfiguration or a genuine attempt by user John Smith
Review password policies and consider strengthening them
verdict: Potential brute force attack or misconfiguration
